## Public Member Functions

### cycleStart() {#a1e7c65a5cb4d8ee833952610b5f74b8f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="Error llvm::mca::DispatchStage::cycleStart ()"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Called once at the start of each cycle.

This can be used as a setup phase to prepare for the executions during the cycle.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/include/llvm/mca/stages/dispatchstage-h/#l00077">77</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/include/llvm/mca/stages/dispatchstage-h">DispatchStage.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mca/lib/mca/stages/dispatchstage-cpp/#l00134">134</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mca/lib/mca/stages/dispatchstage-cpp">DispatchStage.cpp</a>.
